fields.description:
When launching the example application the user is unable to read the text due to UI clashes. 

*Test Steps:*
# Download module from (https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.crypto/)
# Build module
# Copy the the code from the example
# Paste the code into a Titanium application
# Add module to app
# Run Titanium application

*Expected result*
Should be able to read the text in the application 

*Actual result*
Unable to read text in the application
fields.summary: ti.crypto: Example UI need to be updated for android
fields.environment:
MacOS Catalina: 10.15.1 beta
Xcode: 11.3
Java Version: 1.8.0_131
Android NDK: 18.1.5063045
Node.js: 10.16.3
"NPM":"4.2.15-1","CLI":"7.1.2-7"
Pixel xl (7.1.1) Emulator
SDK Version: 9.0.0.v20200207114311

comments.body:
The issues has been address by [~amaheshwari] in following PR:
https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.crypto/pull/15

Verified on below environment:
*Mac OS X* = 10.15
*Xcode*: 11.3.1
*Node.js Version* = 12.16.0
*CLI Version*= 5.2.2

*Emulator* : Nexus6_API27 (8.1.0)
*iOS Simulator*= iPhone 11 Pro Max (13.3)

Its working fine so closing this ticket. Attaching logs for reference.
